content: mommy & me seahorse amigurumi - crochet pattern this pattern is available for free on my blog - www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are paying to purchase an ad-free printable version of this crochet pattern this pattern includes instructions for making the mommy and the baby sea horse when finished mommy seahorse measures about 6 5 inches from top to bottom while baby seahorse is about 5 inches there are so many possibilities with color combinations that you could make a whole family of seahorses each one looking unique this pdf pattern includes step-by-step instructions with lots of photos which makes it easy to follow and also beginner friendly but still fun for more experienced crocheter i hope you enjoy making these seahorses as much as i did materials worsted weight yarn - approx 80yds to make both seahorses crochet hook 3 5mm for mommy seahorse and 3 25mm for baby seahorse poly-fil/stuffing safety eyes 9mm for mommy and 8mm for baby yarn needle for sewing pieces together and weaving in ends if you love ocean themed amigurumi projects please check out the whole collection in the ocean friends amigurumi listing you can get all of the ocean amigurumi patterns including this one together in one ebook with a clickable table of contents for easy navigation **you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose please do not re-publish photos as your own thank you for respecting my rights as the designer and for supporting loops & love crochet thank you and happy crocheting loops & love crochet this pattern and others are available for free on my blog at www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are purchasing an ad-free printable pdf version of the pattern follow on instagram www instagram com/loopsandlovecrochet like on facebook www facebook com/loopsandlovecrochet
